import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { Button, Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import logo from './images/wendys-logo.jpg' class App extends Component { state = { restaurants: [] } componentDidMount() { this.getRestaurants() } getRestaurants = _ => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/restaurants') .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => this.setState({ restaurants: response.data })) .catch(err => console.error(err)); } renderRestaurant = ({ restrntID, Name, Phone, Address, Website, Delivery }) => Wendy's 3305156344 Serving up square patties since 1812.
render() { const { restaurants } = this.state return (
{/* {restaurants.map(this.renderRestaurant)} */} Wendy's 3305156344 Serving up square patties since 1812.
) } } export default App;
